arabicText: ۞ وَلَوْ أَنَّنَا نَزَّلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ وَكَلَّمَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَحَشَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ قُبُلًۭا مَّا كَانُوا۟ لِيُؤْمِنُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَجْهَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Aur	agar	ham	un	ki	taraf	Firishte	utārte	aur	
un	 se	 murde	 bāteiñ	 karte	 aur	 ham	 har	
cheez	un	 ke	sāmne	uthā	lāte	jab	bhi	woh	
Imān	 lāne	 wāle	 na	 they	 magar	 yeh	 ke	
Khuda	 chāhta	 lekin	 un	 meiñ	 bahut	 nire	
jāhil	haiñ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	ham	un	ki	taraf	Firishte	utārte	aur	
un	 se	 murde	 bāteiñ	 karte	 aur	 ham	 har	
cheez	un	 ke	sāmne	uthā	lāte	jab	bhi	woh	
Imān	 lāne	 wāle	 na	 they	 magar	 yeh	 ke	
Khuda	 chāhta	 lekin	 un	 meiñ	 bahut	 nire	
jāhil	haiñ

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّۭا شَيَـٰطِينَ ٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلْجِنِّ يُوحِى بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ زُخْرُفَ ٱلْقَوْلِ غُرُورًۭا ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ مَا فَعَلُوهُ ۖ فَذَرْهُمْ وَمَا يَفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	similarly	We	have	appointed	enemies	
for	 every	 Prophet	- devils	 from	men	 and	
jinns	 - one	 inspires	 the	 other	 with	
fabrications	to	deceive;	and	had	your	Lord	
willed	 they	 would	 not	 do	 so,	 therefore	
leave	them	with	their	fabrications.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	isi	tarah	Ham	ne	har	Nabi	ke	dushman	
kiye	 haiñ	 ādmiyoñ	 aur	 jinnoñ	 meiñ	 ke	
shaitān	ke	un	meiñ	ek	doosre	par	khufiyā	
dālte	 haiñ	 banāwat	 ki	 bāt	 dhoke	 ko	 aur	
tumhāra	Rab	chāhta	to	Woh	aisa	na	karte	
to	unheiñ	 un	ki	banāwatoñ	par	chhord	do

arabicText: وَلِتَصْغَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ أَفْـِٔدَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَلِيَرْضَوْهُ وَلِيَقْتَرِفُوا۟ مَا هُم مُّقْتَرِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	in	order	that	the	hearts	of	those	who	
do	 not	 believe	in	 the	Hereafter	may	lean	
towards	it	 and	 that	 they	may	like	it,	 and	
earn	the	sins	which	they	are	to	earn.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	is	liye	ke	us	ki	taraf	un	ke	dil	jhukeiñ	
jinheiñ	 āakhirat	 par	 Imān	 nahi	 aur	 usey	
pasand	 kareiñ	 aur	 gunāh	 kamāyeiñ jo	
unheiñ		gunāh	kamāna	hai

arabicText: أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبْتَغِى حَكَمًۭا وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مُفَصَّلًۭا ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهُۥ مُنَزَّلٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُمْتَرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“So	 shall	 I	 seek	 the	 command	 other	 than	
that	of	Allah,	whereas	it	is	He	Who	has	sent	
down	 the	 detailed	 Book	 towards	 you?”	
And	those	whom	We	gave	the	Book	know	
that	this	is	the	truth	sent	down	from	your	
Lord,	 so	 O	 listener,	 (followers	 of	 this	
Prophet)	 do	 not	 ever	 be	 of	 those	 who	
doubt
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	Allah	ke	siwa	maiñ	kisi	aur	ka	fāisla	
chāhuñ	 aur	 wohi	 hai	jis	 ne	 tumhāri	 taraf	
mufassal	 kitāb	 utāri	 aur	 jin	 ko	 ham	 ne	
Kitāb	di	woh	jānte	haiñ	ke	yeh	tere	Rab	ki	
taraf	se	sach	utra	hai	 to	aey	sun	ne	wāle"
To	hargiz	shak	wāloñ	meiñ	na	ho

arabicText: وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدْقًۭا وَعَدْلًۭا ۚ لَّا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	Word	of	your	Lord	is	complete	in	
truth	and	justice;	there	is	none	to	change	
His	Words;	He	is	 the	 All	Hearing,	 the	 All	
Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	poori	hai	tere	Rab	ki	bāt	sach	aur	insāf	
meiñ	us	ki	bātoñ	ka	koi	badalne	wāla	nahi	
aur	wohi	hai	sunta	jānta

arabicText: وَإِن تُطِعْ أَكْثَرَ مَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يُضِلُّوكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَإِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا يَخْرُصُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	O	listener,	(followers	of	the	Prophet)	most	of	the	people	on	earth	are	such	that	were	you	to	
obey	them,	they	would	mislead	you	from	Allah’s	way;	they	follow	only	assumptions	and they	only	
make	guesses.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aey	sunne	wāle" Zameen	meiñ	aksar	woh	haiñ	ke	tu	unke	kahe	par	chale	to	tujhe	Allah	ki	rāh	
se	bahka	deiñ	woh	sirf	gumān	ke	peechhe	haiñ	aur	niri	atkaleiñ	(Fuzool	andāze	)	daudāte	haiñ

arabicText: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ مَن يَضِلُّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۖ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText: Your	Lord	well	knows	who	has	strayed	from	His	way;	and	He	well	knows	the	people	on	guidance.
romanUrduTranslationText: Tera	Rab	khoob	jānta	hai	ke	kaun	bahka	us	ki	rāh	se	aur	woh	khoob	jānta	hai	hidāyat	wāloñ	ko

arabicText: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ مَن يَضِلُّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۖ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText: Your	Lord	well	knows	who	has	strayed	from	His	way;	and	He	well	knows	the	people	on	guidance.
romanUrduTranslationText: Tera	Rab	khoob	jānta	hai	ke	kaun	bahka	us	ki	rāh	se	aur	woh	khoob	jānta	hai	hidāyat	wāloñ	ko

arabicText: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText: So	eat	from	that	over	which	Allah’s	name	has	been	mentioned,	if	you	believe	in	His	signs.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	khāo	us	meiñ	se	jis	par	Allah	ka	nām	liya	gayā	agar	tum	uski	āyateiñ	mānte	ho.

arabicText: وَمَا لَكُمْ أَلَّا تَأْكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ وَقَدْ فَصَّلَ لَكُم مَّا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِلَّا مَا ٱضْطُرِرْتُمْ إِلَيْهِ ۗ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا لَّيُضِلُّونَ بِأَهْوَآئِهِم بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	what	is	the	matter	with	you	that	you	
should	not	eat	from	that	over	which	Allah’s	
name	has	been	mentioned	whereas	He	has	
explained	 in	 detail	 to	 you	 all	 what	 is	
forbidden	 to	 you	 except	 when	 you	 are	
forced	(by	circumstances)	towards	it?	And	
indeed	 many	 lead	 astray	 by	 their	 own	
desires,	out	of	ignorance;	indeed	your	Lord	
well	knows	the	transgressors.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tumheiñ	kiya	huwa	ke	us	meiñ	se	na	
khāo	jis	par	Allah	ka	Nām	Liya	gayā	woh	to	
tum	se	mufassal	bayān	kar	chuka	jo	kuchh	
tum	 par	 harām	 huwa	magar	jab	 tumheiñ	
us	 se	 majboori	 ho	 aur	 be-shak	 bahutere	
apni	 khuwahishoñ	 se	 gumrāh	 karte	 haiñ	
be	 jāne	 be-shak	 tera	 Rab	 had se	 badhne	
wāloñ	ko khoob	jānta	hai

arabicText: وَذَرُوا۟ ظَـٰهِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَبَاطِنَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكْسِبُونَ ٱلْإِثْمَ سَيُجْزَوْنَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَقْتَرِفُونَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 chhord	 do	 khulā	 aur	 chhupa	 gunāh	
woh	jo	gunāh	kamāte	haiñ	‘an-qareeb	apni	
kamāyi	ki	sazā	pāayeñ	ge

arabicText: وَلَا تَأْكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا لَمْ يُذْكَرِ ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَفِسْقٌۭ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ لَيُوحُونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَوْلِيَآئِهِمْ لِيُجَـٰدِلُوكُمْ ۖ وَإِنْ أَطَعْتُمُوهُمْ إِنَّكُمْ لَمُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	eat	that	on	which	Allah’s	name	
has	not	been	mentioned,	and	indeed	that	is	
disobedience;	and	undoubtedly	the	devils	
inspire	in	the	hearts	of	their	friends	to	fight	
with	 you;	 and	 if	 you	 obey	 them,	 you	 are	
then	polytheists.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	usey	na	khāo	jis	par	Allah	ka	Nām	na	
liyā	 gayā	 aur	 woh	 be-shak	 ḥukm	 ‘udooli	
hai	 aur	 be-shak	 shaitān	 apne	 dostoñ	 ke	
diloñ	meiñ	dālte	haiñ	 ke	 tum	 se	jhagdeiñ	
aur	agar	tum	unka	kahna	māno	to	us	waqt	
tum	mushrik	ho

arabicText: أَوَمَن كَانَ مَيْتًۭا فَأَحْيَيْنَـٰهُ وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُۥ نُورًۭا يَمْشِى بِهِۦ فِى ٱلنَّاسِ كَمَن مَّثَلُهُۥ فِى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ لَيْسَ بِخَارِجٍۢ مِّنْهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	will	the	one	who	was	dead	and	so	We	
raised	 him	 to	 life	 and	 set	 for him	 a	 light	
with	 which	 he	 walks	 among	 the	 people,	
ever	 be	 like	 the	 one	 who	 is	 in	 realms	 of	
darkness	 never	 to	 emerge	 from	 them?	
Similarly,	 the	 deeds	 of	 disbelievers	 are	
made	to	appear	good	to	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kiya	woh	ke	murda	tha	to	ham	ne	usey	
zinda	kiya	aur	us	ke	liye	ek	Noor	kar	diya	
jis	se	logoñ	meiñ	chalta	hai	woh	us	jaisa	ho	
jāye	ga	jo	andheriyoñ	meiñ	hai	un	se	nikal	
ne	wālā	nahi	yooñ	hi	kāfiroñ	ki	āñkh	meiñ	
un	ke	a’amāl	bhale	kar	diye	gaye	haiñ

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ أَكَـٰبِرَ مُجْرِمِيهَا لِيَمْكُرُوا۟ فِيهَا ۖ وَمَا يَمْكُرُونَ إِلَّا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 similarly,	 We	 have	 made	 in	 every	
town	leaders	among	its	criminals	that	they	
may	conspire	in	it;	and	 they	do	not	conspire	except	against	 themselves	and	 they	do	not	have	
perception.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	isi	tarah	Ham	ne	har	basti	meiñ	us	ke	mujrimoñ	ke	sarghane	kiye	ke	us	meiñ	dāoñ	kheleiñ	
aur	dāoñ	nahi	khelte	magar	apni	jānoñ	par	aur	unheiñ		sha'oor	nhi

arabicText: وَإِذَا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَةٌۭ قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ حَتَّىٰ نُؤْتَىٰ مِثْلَ مَآ أُوتِىَ رُسُلُ ٱللَّهِ ۘ ٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ حَيْثُ يَجْعَلُ رِسَالَتَهُۥ ۗ سَيُصِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ صَغَارٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعَذَابٌۭ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَمْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	a	sign	comes	to	them,	they	say,	“We	will	not	believe	until	we	are	given	the	same	which	
Allah’s	 Noble	 Messengers	 were	 given”;	 Allah knows	 best	 where	 to	 place	 His	 message	
(prophethood);	 soon	 the	 guilty	 will	 be	 afflicted	 with	 disgrace	 before	 Allah and	 a	 severe	
punishment	due	to	their	scheming.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	un	ke	pās	koi	nishāni	āaye	to	kahte	haiñ	ham	hargiz	imān	na	lāayeñ	ge	jab	tak	hameiñ	bhi	
waisa	hi	na	mile	jaisa	Allah	ke	Rasooloñ	ko	mila	Allah	khoob	jānta	hai	jahāñ	apni	Risālat	rakhe	
‘an-qareeb	mujrimoñ	ko	Allah	ke	yahāñ	zillat	pahuñche	gi	aur	sakht	‘aƶāb	badla	un	ke	makr	ka.

arabicText: فَمَن يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَهْدِيَهُۥ يَشْرَحْ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ ۖ وَمَن يُرِدْ أَن يُضِلَّهُۥ يَجْعَلْ صَدْرَهُۥ ضَيِّقًا حَرَجًۭا كَأَنَّمَا يَصَّعَّدُ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَجْعَلُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّجْسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 whomever	 Allah wills	 to	 guide,	 He	
opens	his	bosom	for	Islam;	and	whomever	
He	 wills	 to	 send	 astray,	 He	 makes	 his	
bosom	 narrow	 and	 firmly	 bound	 as	if	 he	
were	being	forced	by	someone	to	climb	the	
skies;	 this	 is	 how	 Allah places	 the	
punishment	on	those	who	do	not	believe
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jise	 Allah	 rāh	 dikhāna	 chāhe	 uska	
seena	 Islam	 ke	liye	 khol	 deta	 hai	aur	jise	
gumrāh	 karna	 chāhe	 uska	 seena	 tang	
khoob	rukā	huwa	kar	deta	hai	goya	kisi	ki	
zabardasti	 se	 āasmān	 par	 chard	 rahā	 hai	
Allah	yuñ hi	‘aƶāb		dālta	hai	Imān	na	lāne	
wāloñ	ko.

arabicText: وَهَـٰذَا صِرَٰطُ رَبِّكَ مُسْتَقِيمًۭا ۗ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 yeh	 tumhāre	 Rab	 ki	 seedhi	 rāh	 hai	
Ham	 ne	 āayateiñ	mufassal	 bayān	 kar	 diñ	
nasihat	mān	ne	wāloñ	ke	liye

arabicText: ۞ لَهُمْ دَارُ ٱلسَّلَـٰمِ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
For	them	is	the	abode	of	peace	with	their	
Lord	and	He	is	their	Master	- the	result	of	
their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unke	liye	salāmati	ka	ghar	hai	apne	Rab	ke	
yahāñ aur	Woh	unka	Maula	hai	yeh	unke	
kāmoñ	ka	phal	hai.

arabicText: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًۭا يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ قَدِ ٱسْتَكْثَرْتُم مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ ۖ وَقَالَ أَوْلِيَآؤُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ رَبَّنَا ٱسْتَمْتَعَ بَعْضُنَا بِبَعْضٍۢ وَبَلَغْنَآ أَجَلَنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَجَّلْتَ لَنَا ۚ قَالَ ٱلنَّارُ مَثْوَىٰكُمْ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	Day	when	He	will	 raise	 them	 all	
and	 will	 proclaim,	 “O	 you	 group	 of	 jinns,	
you	have	enticed	a	lot	of	men”;	and	 their	
human	 friends	 will	 submit,	 “Our	 Lord,	
some	 of	 us	 have	 benefited	 from	 one	
another	 and	 have	 reached	 the	 appointed	
term	which	You	had	set	for	us”;	He	will	say,	
“Your	home	is hell	- remain	in	it	 for	ever,	
except	 whomever	 Allah wills”;	 O	 dear	
Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him),	indeed	your	Lord	is	the	Wise,	
the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jis	 din	 un	 sab	 ko	 uthāaye	 ga	 aur	
farmāaye	 ga	 aey	 jinn	 ke	 giroh" Tumne	
bahut	 āadmi	 gher	liye	 aur	 unke	liye	 dost	
āadmi	‘arz	kareñ	ge	aey	hamāre	Rab" Hum	
meiñ	 ek	 ne	 doosre	 se	 fāyeda	 uthāya	 aur	
ham	apni	is	mee'ād	ko	pahuñch	gaye	jo	tu	
ne	 hamāre	 liye	 muqarrar	 farmāyi	 thi	
farmāaye	 ga	 āag	 tumhāra	 thikāna	 hai	
hamesha	 is	 meiñ	 raho	 magar	 jise	 khudā	
chāhe	aey	Mehboob" Be-shak	tumhāra	Rab	
hikmat	wāla	Ilm	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّى بَعْضَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَعْضًۢا بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 similarly	 We	 empower	 some	 of	 the	
oppressors	over	others	- the	recompense	
of	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yuñ	hi	ham	Ƶālimoñ	meiñ	ek	ko	doosre	par	musallat	kartey	haiñ	badla	unke	kiye	ka

arabicText: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌۭ مِّنكُمْ يَقُصُّونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِى وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ شَهِدْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِنَا ۖ وَغَرَّتْهُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَشَهِدُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ أَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ كَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“O	you	groups	of	jinns	and	men!	Did	not	the	Noble	Messengers	amongst	you	come	to	you	reciting	
My	verses	and	warning	you	of	confronting	this	day?”	They	will	say,	“We	testify	against	ourselves”	
- and	 the	 worldly	 life	 deceived	 them	 and	 they	 will	 testify	 against	 themselves	 that	 they	 were	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	jinnoñ	aur	ādmiyoñ	ke	giroh" Kya	tumhāre	pās	tum	meiñ	ke	Rasool	na	āaye	they	tum	par	
meri	āayateiñ	padhte	aur	 tumheiñ	yeh	din	dekhne	se	darāte	kaheñ	ge	ham	ne	apni	jānoñ	par	
gawāhi	di	aur	unheiñ		duniya	ki	zindagi	ne	fareb	diya	aur	khud	apni	jānoñ	par	gawāhi	deñge	ke	
woh	kāfir	they

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ أَن لَّمْ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهْلِكَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ بِظُلْمٍۢ وَأَهْلُهَا غَـٰفِلُونَ
englishTranslationText: This	is	because	your	Lord	does	not	unjustly	destroy	townships	for	their	people	may	be	unaware.
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	is	liye	ke	tera	Rab	bastiyoñ	ko	zulm	se	tabāh	nahi	karta	ke	unke	log	be-khabar	hoñ.

arabicText: وَلِكُلٍّۢ دَرَجَـٰتٌۭ مِّمَّا عَمِلُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 for	 everyone	 are	 ranks	 from	 what	
they	do;	and	your	Lord	is	not	unaware	of	
their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 har	 ek	 ke	 liye	 unke	 kāmoñ	 se	 darje	
haiñ	 aur	 tera	 Rab	 unke	 a‘amāl	 se	 bekhabar	nahi

arabicText: وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ذُو ٱلرَّحْمَةِ ۚ إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَسْتَخْلِفْ مِنۢ بَعْدِكُم مَّا يَشَآءُ كَمَآ أَنشَأَكُم مِّن ذُرِّيَّةِ قَوْمٍ ءَاخَرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	your	Lord	is	the	
Perfect	 (Not	 needing	 anything),	 the	
Merciful;	 O	 people!	 If	 He	 wills,	 He	 can	
remove	you	and	bring	others	in	your	stead	
- the	 way	 He	 created	 you	 from	 the	
descendants	of	others.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aey	Mehboob"tumhāra	Rab	be-parwāh	
hai	Reḥmat	wāla	aey	logoñ" Woh	chāhe	to	
tumheiñ	 le	 jāye	 aur	 jise	 chāhe	 tumhāri	
jagah	lā	de	jaise	tumheiñ	auroñ	ki	aulād	se	
paida	kiya

arabicText: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَـَٔاتٍۢ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	the	thing	which	you	are	promised	
will	 definitely	 come	 to	 pass,	 and	 you	
cannot	escape.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	jis	ka	tumheiñ	w'āda	diya	jāta	hai	
zaroor	 āane	 wāli	 hai	 aur	 tum	 thaka	 nahi	
sakte

arabicText: قُلْ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَامِلٌۭ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ مَن تَكُونُ لَهُۥ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلدَّارِ ۗ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“O	my	people!	
Keep	 on	 with	 your	 works	 *	 in	 your	
positions,	 I	am	doing	mine;	soon	you	will	
come	to	know	for	whom	is	the	abode	of	the	
Hereafter;	 undoubtedly	 the	 unjust	 are	
never	 successful.”	 (*	 This	 is	 said	 as	 a	
challenge)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	 aey	 meri	 qaum" tum	 apni	
jagah	 par	 kām	 kiye	 jāo	 maiñ	 apna	 kām	
karta	 hooñ	 to	 ab	 jānna	 chāhte	 ho	 kis	 ka	
rahta	 hai	 āakhirat	 ka	 ghar	 be-shak	 Ƶālim	
falāh	nahi pāte	.
